completion: Ah, the sugar bugs. They throw wild parties on your teeth and invite cavities over. It's mostly from sugary treats and poor brushing habits.
Ideally, once a day. But hey, I won't tell your dentist if you skip a day or two. Just don't blame me for any rogue popcorn kernels.
Oh, the eternal debate! Look for fluoride, that's the real hero here. But honestly, the best toothpaste is the one you'll actually use. Minty fresh or fruity fun, take your pick!
